body_html:
I'm closing this issue due to inactivity. I'll open this again if the issue is updated with new information.

One thing you'll be pleased to hear @cancan101 is that I managed to cut down the disk size used by Bazel by a few hundred megs in 65038b0 on September 21st.

body:
I'm closing this issue due to inactivity. I'll open this again if the issue is updated with new information.

One thing you'll be pleased to hear @cancan101 is that I managed to cut down the disk size used by Bazel by a few hundred megs in 65038b084059cf934df50fa86dba5b0e765f9d65 on September 21st.
